original_text: And there fell ten portions to Manasseh, beside the land of Gilead and Bashan, which were on the other side Jordan;
korean_text: 요단 동쪽 길르앗과 바산 외에 므낫세에게 열 분깃이 돌아갔으니

sentences.original_text: And there fell ten portions to Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 므낫세 지파에 열 몫이 떨어졌으며

sentences.original_text: beside the land of Gilead and Bashan
which were on the other side Jordan
